plugin.name: Binjatron
plugin.description: Synchronise the Binary Ninja binary view with a debugger via Voltron.
plugin.longdescription: Voltron is a debugger UI framework for LLDB, GDB, WinDbg and VDB. This plugin enables integration of Binary Ninja with Voltron by synchronising the binary view with the debugger's current instruction pointer, and marking breakpoints set in the debugger in the binary view.
